Detailed Description

Predicate class for atoms being connected to a constellation defined by an expression. Syntax: {tabular}{cl} Bonds

- & single

= & double

# & triple

{126} & aromatic

. & any

Elements &

symbol & the desired element

* & any element

Groups &

( ) & symbols enlosed by brackets denote groups

{tabular}
